segments.pli: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, telañca paṭicca vaṭṭiñca paṭicca telappadīpo jhāyeyya.
segments.en: “Mendicants, suppose an oil lamp depended on oil and a wick to burn.

segments.pli: Tatra puriso kālena kālaṃ telaṃ āsiñceyya vaṭṭiṃ upasaṃhareyya.
segments.en: And from time to time someone would pour oil in and adjust the wick.

segments.pli: Evañhi so, bhikkhave, telappadīpo tadāhāro tadupādāno ciraṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ jaleyya.
segments.en: Fueled and sustained by that, the oil lamp would burn for a long time.

segments.pli: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assādānupassino viharato taṇhā pavaḍḍhati.
segments.en: In the same way, there are things that are prone to being fettered. When you concentrate on the gratification provided by these things, your craving grows.
Craving is a condition for grasping. …
That is how this entire mass of suffering originates.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, telañca paṭicca vaṭṭiñca paṭicca telappadīpo jhāyeyya.
segments.en: Suppose an oil lamp depended on oil and a wick to burn.

segments.pli: Tatra puriso na kālena kālaṃ telaṃ āsiñceyya na vaṭṭiṃ upasaṃhareyya.
segments.en: And no-one would pour oil in and adjust the wick from time to time.

segments.pli: Evañhi so, bhikkhave, telappadīpo purimassa ca upādānassa pariyādānā aññassa ca anupahārā anāhāro nibbāyeyya.
segments.en: As the original fuel is used up and no more is added, the oil lamp would be extinguished due to lack of fuel.

segments.pli: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu ādīnavānupassino viharato taṇhā nirujjhati.
segments.en: In the same way, there are things that are prone to being fettered. When you concentrate on the drawbacks of these things, your craving ceases.
That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.”

suttaplex.blurb: Craving increases when you linger on pleasing things that stimulate fetters, illustrated with the simile of a lamp.
